item.description:
Summer Term starts here...

Tickets are $10 in advance by paypal to colonialcavaliers@gmail.com
Get your tickets in advance to guarantee Entry, support a fantastic cause and save yourself $5! Otherwise our Prefects will shake you down for even more lunch money on the door...50% of the proceeds will be donated to the Pancreatic Cancer Society and 50% to the Colonial Cavaliers Cricket Club (who kindly donate time & energy to put on this great event for all).

DJ Stig & Richie will be spinning Old Skool UK Tunes - please post your requests below!

School uniform is strongly encouraged, if you have not been to one of our school disco's before and you're not in school uniform then people will assume you are a teacher.

Anyone caught misbehaving will be given detention!
item.why: The Boston Brits have asked me to post this event on our site. The night will be raising money for Pancreatic Cancer Society and the Colonial Cavaliers Cricket Club.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Brits event: Annual School Disco 2011
